message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I appreciate your offer, $18,000 is my bottom line. I believe this product will bring you significant value and would hate for you to miss out.
Hi Alice, I understand that $18,000 is your bottom line, but I'm still a bit hesitant to spend that much. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Can you consider meeting me halfway?
